title: Oilskin cloak/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak "Oilskin cloak")**

 • [한국어](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak/ko "Oilskin cloak/ko")

 • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   油布斗篷   [![Oilskin cloak.png](/images/2/2a/Oilskin_cloak.png)](/wiki/File:Oilskin_cloak.png) |                                                                                                                 |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                               | 湿滑的斗篷                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                  |                                                                                                                 |
| 装备槽位                                                                                             | [斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")                                                                             |
| AC                                                                                               | [1](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)") |
| 特殊效果                                                                                             | - [MC2](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔 (page does not exist)")
- 光滑            |
|                                                                                                  |                                                                                                                 |
| 基础价                                                                                              | 50 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                          |
| 重量                                                                                               | [10](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                    |
| 材料                                                                                               | [布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")                               |

**油布斗篷**（oilskin cloak）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**湿滑的斗篷**（slippery cloak）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 消息](#.E6.B6.88.E6.81.AF)

- [6 Variants](#Variants)

  - [6.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [6.2 dNethack](#dNethack)
  - [6.3 FIQHack](#FIQHack)
  - [6.4 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [6.5 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

油布斗篷在随机生成斗篷里占0.8%。

## 描述

油布斗篷的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，并能提供[MC](/index.php?title=MC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "MC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")2。

油布斗篷在功能上相当于永久拥有[上油](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%8A%E6%B2%B9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "上油 (page does not exist)")属性的[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")。只要斗篷是非诅咒状态，它就可以使穿戴者免疫一切[擒抱](/index.php?title=%E6%93%92%E6%8A%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "擒抱 (page does not exist)")攻击（包括[水生怪物](/index.php?title=%E6%B0%B4%E7%94%9F%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "水生怪物 (page does not exist)")的[淹溺攻击](/index.php?title=%E6%B7%B9%E6%BA%BA%E6%94%BB%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "淹溺攻击 (page does not exist)")）[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。此外，它也可保护穿在里面的金属铠甲不受水浸损伤[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。被诅咒的油布斗篷只有2⁄3的概率发挥效果。

## 策略

油布斗篷可以有效地抵御致命的淹溺攻击，能够作为[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")的组件之一。只要你把[魔法抵抗](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E6%8A%B5%E6%8A%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法抵抗 (page does not exist)")和[反射](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8D%E5%B0%84\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "反射 (page does not exist)")等关键特质通过非斗篷装备集齐了，油布斗篷就可以作为斗篷备选。使用其他斗篷的玩家也可以通过其他手段抵御淹溺攻击，比如给斗篷[上油](/index.php?title=%E4%B8%8A%E6%B2%B9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "上油 (page does not exist)")。

## 历史

油布斗篷最初于[NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0")加入游戏。到[NetHack 3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.3 "NetHack 3.1.3")为止，它具有[随机外观](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")，玩家无法通过外观直接判断它的种类，[NetHack 3.2.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.0 "NetHack 3.2.0")开始，油布斗篷拥有独一无二的外观。

在[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及更早版本，油布斗篷提供[MC3](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%883.4.3%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔（3.4.3） (page does not exist)")。

## 消息

- 湿滑的斗篷穿得非常紧。（The slippery cloak fits very tightly.）

  你穿上了未诅咒的油布斗篷。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Oilskin_cloak/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the oilskin cloak grants MC3 while worn.

The chest at the end of the southwest secret passage behind the [throne](/wiki/Throne "Throne") room of [Grund's Stronghold](/wiki/Grund%27s_Stronghold "Grund's Stronghold") has a 1⁄3 chance of containing an oilskin cloak.

[Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a [cloak of protection](/wiki/Cloak_of_protection "Cloak of protection"), [cloak of invisibility](/wiki/Cloak_of_invisibility "Cloak of invisibility"), [cloak of magic resistance](/wiki/Cloak_of_magic_resistance "Cloak of magic resistance"), [cloak of displacement](/wiki/Cloak_of_displacement "Cloak of displacement"), [dwarvish cloak](/wiki/Dwarvish_cloak "Dwarvish cloak") or [orcish cloak](/wiki/Orcish_cloak "Orcish cloak") has a 1⁄2 chance of producing an oilskin cloak; upgrading an oilskin cloak can produce a cloak of protection, cloak of invisibility, cloak of magic resistance, or cloak of displacement with an equal probability of each.

### dNethack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), an oilskin cloak grants 1 AC, 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and MC3 when worn, and protects the entire inventory from water damage as opposed to just worn body armor, with the same rates depending on beatitude.

[The Cloak of the Unheld One](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Cloak_of_the_Unheld_One "DNetHack artifacts") is a [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") and [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact") [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") oilskin cloak. While carried, it grants [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), and while worn it also grants magic resistance and [free action](/wiki/Free_action "Free action") in addition to its usual properties; it can be safely enchanted to +7. Invoking The Cloak of the Unheld One while wearing it causes you to [teleport](/wiki/Teleport "Teleport"): if you are not wearing it at the time, it will teleport itself instead. If invoked on a no-teleport level, it will attempt to warp you to the level above, and will warp you one level below otherwise.

### FIQHack

In [FIQHack](/wiki/FIQHack "FIQHack"), oilskin cloaks protect the entire inventory from water damage.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [Divers](/wiki/Diver "Diver") start the game with a +1 oilskin cloak, and [Pirates](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") and [Corsairs](/wiki/Corsair "Corsair") start the game with the oilskin cloak's appearance identified. [Player monster](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") divers also generate with oilskin cloaks.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), the chest at the end of the southwest secret passage behind the throne room of Grund's Stronghold has the same 1⁄3 chance of containing an oilskin cloak. Oilskin cloaks cannot be upgraded or produced by upgrading.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/mhitu.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 845](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mhitu.c#L845)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/uhitm.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1421](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/uhitm.c#L1421)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/trap.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1154](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/trap.c#L1154)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/trap.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1154](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/trap.c#L1154)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Oilskin cloak/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Oilskin cloak
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 한국어

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   油布斗篷  
外观 湿滑的斗篷
装备槽位 斗篷
AC 1
特殊效果
  • MC2
  • 光滑
基础价 50 zm
重量 10
材料 布

油布斗篷（oilskin cloak）是NetHack中的一种斗篷类防具。它由布制成，未鉴定时外观为湿滑的斗篷（slippery cloak）。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 消息
  • 6 Variants
    • 6.1 SLASH'EM
    • 6.2 dNethack
    • 6.3 FIQHack
    • 6.4 SlashTHEM
    • 6.5 Hack'EM
  • 7 引用及注释

生成

油布斗篷在随机生成斗篷里占0.8%。

描述

油布斗篷的基础AC加成为1，并能提供MC2。

油布斗篷在功能上相当于永久拥有上油属性的斗篷。只要斗篷是非诅咒状态，它就可以使穿戴者免疫一切擒抱攻击（包括水生怪物的淹溺攻击）[1][2]。此外，它也可保护穿在里面的金属铠甲不受水浸损伤[3][4]。被诅咒的油布斗篷只有2⁄3的概率发挥效果。

策略

油布斗篷可以有效地抵御致命的淹溺攻击，能够作为飞升套件的组件之一。只要你把魔法抵抗和反射等关键特质通过非斗篷装备集齐了，油布斗篷就可以作为斗篷备选。使用其他斗篷的玩家也可以通过其他手段抵御淹溺攻击，比如给斗篷上油。

历史

油布斗篷最初于NetHack 3.1.0加入游戏。到NetHack 3.1.3为止，它具有随机外观，玩家无法通过外观直接判断它的种类，NetHack 3.2.0开始，油布斗篷拥有独一无二的外观。

在NetHack 3.4.3及更早版本，油布斗篷提供MC3。

消息

湿滑的斗篷穿得非常紧。（The slippery cloak fits very tightly.）
你穿上了未诅咒的油布斗篷。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, the oilskin cloak grants MC3 while worn.

The chest at the end of the southwest secret passage behind the throne room of Grund's Stronghold has a 1⁄3 chance of containing an oilskin cloak.

Upgrading a cloak of protection, cloak of invisibility, cloak of magic resistance, cloak of displacement, dwarvish cloak or orcish cloak has a 1⁄2 chance of producing an oilskin cloak; upgrading an oilskin cloak can produce a cloak of protection, cloak of invisibility, cloak of magic resistance, or cloak of displacement with an equal probability of each.

dNethack

In dNetHack, an oilskin cloak grants 1 AC, 0 DR and MC3 when worn, and protects the entire inventory from water damage as opposed to just worn body armor, with the same rates depending on beatitude.

The Cloak of the Unheld One is a neutral and intelligent artifact oilskin cloak. While carried, it grants sleep resistance, and while worn it also grants magic resistance and free action in addition to its usual properties; it can be safely enchanted to +7. Invoking The Cloak of the Unheld One while wearing it causes you to teleport: if you are not wearing it at the time, it will teleport itself instead. If invoked on a no-teleport level, it will attempt to warp you to the level above, and will warp you one level below otherwise.

FIQHack

In FIQHack, oilskin cloaks protect the entire inventory from water damage.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, Divers start the game with a +1 oilskin cloak, and Pirates and Corsairs start the game with the oilskin cloak's appearance identified. Player monster divers also generate with oilskin cloaks.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, the chest at the end of the southwest secret passage behind the throne room of Grund's Stronghold has the same 1⁄3 chance of containing an oilskin cloak. Oilskin cloaks cannot be upgraded or produced by upgrading.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/mhitu.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 845
  2. ↑ src/uhitm.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1421
  3. ↑ src/trap.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1154
  4. ↑ src/trap.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1154

|cost=50 |weight=10 |material=布 }} '''油布斗篷'''（oilskin cloak）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[斗篷]]类[[防具]]。它由[[布]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观为'''湿滑的斗篷'''（slippery cloak）。 == 生成 == 油布斗篷在随机生成斗篷里占0.8%。 == 描述 == 油布斗篷的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，并能提供{{cnlink|MC}}2。 油布斗篷在功能上相当于永久拥有[[上油]]属性的[[斗篷]]。只要斗篷是非诅咒状态，它就可以使穿戴者免疫一切[[擒抱]]攻击（包括[[水生怪物]]的[[淹溺攻击]]）{{refsrc|src/mhitu.c|845|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/uhitm.c|1421|nethack=3.6.7}}。此外，它也可保护穿在里面的金属铠甲不受水浸损伤{{refsrc|src/trap.c|1154|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/trap.c|1154|nethack=3.6.7}}。被诅咒的油布斗篷只有{{frac|2|3}}的概率发挥效果。 == 策略 == 油布斗篷可以有效地抵御致命的淹溺攻击，能够作为[[飞升套件]]的组件之一。只要你把[[魔法抵抗]]和[[反射]]等关键特质通过非斗篷装备集齐了，油布斗篷就可以作为斗篷备选。使用其他斗篷的玩家也可以通过其他手段抵御淹溺攻击，比如给斗篷[[上油]]。 == 历史 == 油布斗篷最初于[[NetHack 3.1.0]]加入游戏。到[[NetHack 3.1.3]]为止，它具有[[随机外观]]，玩家无法通过外观直接判断它的种类，[[NetHack 3.2.0]]开始，油布斗篷拥有独一无二的外观。 在[[NetHack 3.4.3]]及更早版本，油布斗篷提供[[销魔（3.4.3）|MC3]]。 == 消息 == {{message/zh-CN|湿滑的斗篷穿得非常紧。|你穿上了未诅咒的油布斗篷。|The slippery cloak fits very tightly.}} ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], the oilskin cloak grants MC3 while worn. The chest at the end of the southwest secret passage behind the [[throne]] room of [[Grund's Stronghold]] has a {{frac|3}} chance of containing an oilskin cloak. [[Upgrading]] a [[cloak of protection]], [[cloak of invisibility]], [[cloak of magic resistance]], [[cloak of displacement]], [[dwarvish cloak]] or [[orcish cloak]] has a {{frac|2}} chance of producing an oilskin cloak; upgrading an oilskin cloak can produce a cloak of protection, cloak of invisibility, cloak of magic resistance, or cloak of displacement with an equal probability of each. ===dNethack=== In [[dNetHack]], an oilskin cloak grants 1 AC, 0 [[DR]] and MC3 when worn, and protects the entire inventory from water damage as opposed to just worn body armor, with the same rates depending on beatitude. [[DNetHack artifacts#The Cloak of the Unheld One|The Cloak of the Unheld One]] is a [[neutral]] and [[Intelligent artifact|intelligent]] [[artifact]] oilskin cloak. While carried, it grants [[sleep resistance]], and while worn it also grants magic resistance and [[free action]] in addition to its usual properties; it can be safely enchanted to +7. Invoking The Cloak of the Unheld One while wearing it causes you to [[teleport]]: if you are not wearing it at the time, it will teleport itself instead. If invoked on a no-teleport level, it will attempt to warp you to the level above, and will warp you one level below otherwise. ===FIQHack=== In [[FIQHack]], oilskin cloaks protect the entire inventory from water damage. ===SlashTHEM=== In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, [[Diver]]s start the game with a +1 oilskin cloak, and [[Pirate]]s and [[Corsair]]s start the game with the oilskin cloak's appearance identified. [[Player monster]] divers also generate with oilskin cloaks. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], the chest at the end of the southwest secret passage behind the throne room of Grund's Stronghold has the same {{frac|3}} chance of containing an oilskin cloak. Oilskin cloaks cannot be upgraded or produced by upgrading. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Cloaks/zh-CN|YOUBUDOUPENG]]
